project.description: Merge a pull request after tests have passes in serial

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LI_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the li repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CRANKCASE_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the crankcase repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RHC_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the rhc repo.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf li rhc crankcase git clone git@github.com:openshift/li.git if [ -n "$LI_PULL_ID" ] then pushd li set +x SECRET=`cat ~/.config/secret` curl --basic -u "openshift-bot:$SECRET" https://github.com/openshift/li/pull/$LI_PULL_ID.patch | git am set -x popd fi git clone git@github.com:openshift/crankcase.git if [ -n "$CRANKCASE_PULL_ID" ] then pushd crankcase curl https://github.com/openshift/rhc/pull/$CRANKCASE_PULL_ID.patch | git am popd fi git clone git@github.com:openshift/rhc.git if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ] then pushd rhc curl https://github.com/openshift/rhc/pull/$RHC_PULL_ID.patch | git am popd fi
pushd li build/devenv build merge_pull_request ${BUILD_NUMBER} --terminate --install_from_local_source --instance_type m1.large popd
if [ -n "$LI_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --config /etc/openshift/test_pull_request.li --merge_pull_request $LI_PULL_ID fi
if [ -n "$CRANKCASE_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --config /etc/openshift/test_pull_request.crankcase --merge_pull_request $CRANKCASE_PULL_ID fi
if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --config /etc/openshift/test_pull_request.rhc --merge_pull_request $RHC_PULL_ID fi
